entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Vermon is doing ok now. Thanks to you an innocent man was spared, and a sick man is getting better.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vermon seems to hold on to a grudge long after he should let it go. You're supposed to be his vengeance for some stolen food. He still wants revenge against a slave that wronged him even after he has gained his freedom. Can you give him the justice he seems to think he is owed, or will you find another way?
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Vermon did give you much to go on. Enter the slaver bunker and ask around and see if anyone has heard of Akers.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Dulor said you could probably find out Akers location from one of the technician's datapads. You'll have to get one from them. They probably won't want to give one up willingly.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Read the datapad and find out Aker's location.
entries.task02_message_box_text: The slave tracking program on the technician's datapad lists Akers as currently being in the high security slave pen. That pen appears to be one level below you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Try to find Aker's and talk to him about Vermon.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Aker's told you that Vermon is not usually like that. He escaped without his medication. Vermon needs that medication. Slice the medical computer and find out where the medication is stored.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Get the Vermon's medication from the medicine supply cabinet.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Give the medication to Akers to take back to Vermon.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Head back to Vermon and make sure he got his medication, and is doing ok.
